Information {.sidebar}
=====================================


Australian Overview
===================================== 

Row {data-height=150}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Australian Confirmed

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Count), 
         icon = "fa-frown-o",
         color = "primary")

```


### Australian Recovered

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Re$Count), 
         icon = "fa-medkit",
         color = "success")

```

### Australian Deaths

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_De$Count), 
         icon = "fa-times-circle",
         color = "danger")
```

### Australian Data Last Updated

```{r}
valueBox(max(Data_Australia$Dates), 
         icon = "fa-clock",
         color = "primary")
```


Row {data-height=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Total Number of Confirmed Cases 

```{r}

ggplotly(ggplot(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co, aes(x = Location, y = Count, fill = Location)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    scale_fill_hue() +
    theme_minimal() +
    labs(title = "", x = "", y = "") +
    theme(legend.position = "none") +
    geom_text(label = Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Count, nudge_y = 10) +
    scale_fill_brewer(palette="Blues"))
  

```


Row {data-height=550}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Confirmed Cases Overtime 

```{r}

ggplotly(ggplot(Data_Australia_Co) +
  aes(x = Dates, fill = Location, weight = Count) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  scale_fill_hue() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "", x = "", y = "") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  facet_wrap(vars(Location)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Blues"))


```
